Text: hey guys, I'm new here. Can anybody tell me what NTSC means?

This is the CAM/TS version. The UL should have wrote that in the nfo or in the title. The quality it's not good at all. But what can you expect? When someone rec it with a handycam.

NTSC, named for the National Television System Committee, is the analog television system that is used in most of North America,
